itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Processing an Insectivore Plant Flower or an Insectivore Plant Leaf . It can also be Gathered from Insectivore Plants using Bare Hands or a Hoe. Insectivore Plants require a certain level of skill to collect.

item.name: Insectivore Plant Flower
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from the Naga Marsh’s Poisonous Plants.

item.name: Insectivore Plant Leaf
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from the Naga Marsh’s Poisonous Plants.
